attributes.action: Undertake an early referendum to withdraw the United Kingdom from the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to try and restore the United Kingdom to its rightful place in world democracy and its ties with the British Empire, it is requested that the Government of the day, withdraw from the European Union at the earliest opportunity and not later than December 2008.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
